name: Befriending the Scarily Cute Fisherman
storyline: Cory's best friend dares him to befriend the local fisherman, who is rumored to be a dangerous criminal. Cory is terrified of the fisherman at first, but since he doesn't want to seem like a coward to his friend, he tries his best to get along with the fisherman. But during his attempts, he starts to think that the fisherman is actually cute. Soon, he finds himself having a massive crush on the man he used to be terrified of.
summary: A 21-year-old who just wants to have fun and enjoy his youth, and a 31-year-old who's trying to get by and sell fishes for a living. The only thing they have in common is that they're awkward around each other.
